Summary Note:
Alejandra Carmen Herrera and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Madrid. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
With a career spanning nearly 40 years, Alejandra Carmen Herrera has established herself as a key player in the industry.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Alejandra Carmen Herrera has been happily married to Navarro since 1990. Alejandra and Navarro have 2 children, named Alejandra and Morales.
Education Background: Alejandra completed her university studies at University of Granada in 1985.
Occupation History:
Alejandra Carmen Herrera is a 64 year old and comes from Spain.
Alejandra Carmen Herrera launched her career as a Property Manager at Metrovacesa S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 1985 to 1990.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Developer at Realia Business S.A. in 1992, further expanding her skill set.
From 1997 to 2002, she served as a Construction Company Owner at Realia Business S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
In 2002, she transitioned to Merlin Properties SOCIMI S.A. to take on the position of Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) CEO, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Until retiring, Alejandra Carmen Herrera served as a Landlord at Metrovacesa S.A., contributing significantly from 2007 to 2021.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 890000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful townhouse in Segovia, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 930000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
